title: How to Make a Cement Mixer Shot

steps.headline: Measure and pour both ingredients in separate shot glasses.
Shoot the Baileys, but do not swallow.
Swish or swirl the contents around until you can't take it anymore.

text: Measure and pour both ingredients in separate shot glasses.  Shoot the Baileys, but do not swallow. Hold it in your mouth. Shoot the lime juice. Hold this in your mouth. Swish or swirl the contents around until you can't take it anymore.  Gulp down and enjoy. The flavors will be delicious.
